title: How to Make Perfume (Flower Blossoms and Water Method)

steps.title: Line the bowl with cheesecloth, allowing for the edges to hang over a bit.
steps.content: Line the bowl with cheesecloth, allowing for the edges to hang over a bit.

steps.title: Place the flower petals in the bowl.
steps.content: Place the flower petals in the bowl.

steps.title: Allow to sit overnight and through the next day.
steps.content: Allow to sit overnight and through the next day. Steep for at least 24 hours. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Use the edges of the cheesecloth, to pull the flowers out of the bowl.
steps.content: Use the edges of the cheesecloth, to pull the flowers out of the bowl.

steps.title: Pour the water into a pot, and squeeze the excess scented water out of the cheesecloth-bundled flowers.
steps.content: Pour the water into a pot, and squeeze the excess scented water out of the cheesecloth-bundled flowers.

steps.title: Turn on the heat, and allow the water to simmer down to about a teaspoon.
steps.content: Turn on the heat, and allow the water to simmer down to about a teaspoon. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Pour your perfume into a small bottle.
steps.content: Pour your perfume into a small bottle. Enjoy!

steps.title: Put highly scented flowers, such as roses into a bowl of water.
steps.content: Put highly scented flowers, such as roses into a bowl of water.

steps.title: Squeeze the flowers with your fingertips.
steps.content: Squeeze the flowers with your fingertips.

steps.title: Allow the flowers to sit for about 30 minutes to an hour.
steps.content: Allow the flowers to sit for about 30 minutes to an hour.

steps.title: Separate the flowers from the water when the time is up.
steps.content: Separate the flowers from the water when the time is up. Pour through a sieve or through cheesecloth/muslin.

steps.title: Pour the water into a bottle.
steps.content: Pour the water into a bottle. This is very subtle, quickly made perfume. It will need frequent reapplication or can be used in a bath to cover you in a lovely scent.
